name: Bot Hunter Pro
description:
Explore a Robit infested micro city on a mission to bonk all of said bots out of existence and keep them from surveilling your every move. 

Made for a final course project over the course of two or three weeks all by myself. Currently complete as far as a tech demo goes, though I do hope and intend to continue working on this idea soon to expand it further. As for now, its a fairly short experience, but I hope you enjoy it :>

Features:

  • Procedurally animated Robits
  • All original art and assets
  • Bonking action
  • Drinks

Known Bugs:

  • Attack anim occasionally doesnt play
  • Robit anim struggles with corners
  • Sometimes Robits get stuck
  • Sometimes Robits start drifting after being hit

Thank you to my friends for contributing to the graffiti around the city :)
